nicknames.name: Panipuri Slayer
nicknames.description: Food-loving nickname showing her love for panipuri

colors.name: Black
colors.pickup: You make everything else fade to black and white when you're around.

colors.name: Purple
colors.pickup: My world turns purple with passion whenever I think of you.

drinks.name: Ice Coffee Mojito
drinks.pickup: You're more refreshing than my favorite ice coffee mojito on a hot day.

drinks.name: Coke
drinks.pickup: You give me that bubbly feeling, just like the first sip of Coke.

drinks.name: Sprite
drinks.pickup: Like Sprite, you're crisp, refreshing, and always lift my spirits.

mlbbSpells.name: Flameshot
mlbbSpells.description: Powerful offensive spell that deals magic damage
mlbbSpells.pickup: You hit me with a Flameshot straight to the heart, and I don't want to recover.

mlbbSpells.name: Flicker
mlbbSpells.pickup: No matter where I Flicker, my heart always finds its way back to you.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Chocolate
iceCreamFlavors.pickup: You're as irresistible as chocolate ice cream melting on a warm day.

iceCreamFlavors.name: Vanilla
iceCreamFlavors.pickup: Like vanilla ice cream, you're a classic beauty that never goes out of style.

musicGenres.name: Pop
musicGenres.pickup: Our love story would be a perfect pop song - catchy and unforgettable.

musicGenres.name: Folk
musicGenres.pickup: Like folk music, our connection feels timeless and deeply rooted.

musicGenres.name: Traditional
musicGenres.pickup: You make me appreciate the traditional values of love and commitment.

musicGenres.name: Hip-hop
musicGenres.pickup: You've got more rhythm than my favorite hip-hop track.

musicGenres.name: Rap
musicGenres.pickup: I could rap for hours about how amazing you are.

musicGenres.name: Old Songs
musicGenres.pickup: Like old songs, my love for you only gets better with time.

foods.name: Momo
foods.pickup: You're more irresistible than a steaming plate of momos on a cold day.

foods.name: Panipuri
foods.description: Crispy hollow puri with spicy water
foods.pickup: Like panipuri, you're the perfect combination of crisp, spicy, and sweet.

mlbbMaleHeroes.name: Ling
mlbbMaleHeroes.description: Agile assassin who can scale walls
mlbbMaleHeroes.pickup: Like Ling, I'd scale any obstacle just to be by your side.

mlbbMaleHeroes.name: Hayabusa
mlbbMaleHeroes.pickup: You've captured me more completely than Hayabusa's ultimate.

mlbbFemaleHeroes.name: Kagura
mlbbFemaleHeroes.pickup: You've cast a spell on me more powerful than any of Kagura's abilities.

mlbbFemaleHeroes.name: Lylia
mlbbFemaleHeroes.pickup: Like Lylia, you have the power to stop time whenever you enter the room.

anime.name: One Piece
anime.pickup: If I were in One Piece, I'd search the entire Grand Line just to find a treasure as precious as you.

games.name: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang (MLBB)
games.pickup: You must be a MLBB pro, because you've captured my heart without even trying.

flowers.name: Rose
flowers.pickup: Even the most beautiful rose can't compare to your natural beauty.

flowers.name: Tulips
flowers.pickup: Like tulips in spring, you bring new life and color to my world.

flowers.name: Daisy
flowers.pickup: Your smile is as bright and cheerful as a field of daisies.

emotes.name: Thumb Emote
emotes.pickup: I'd give you a thumbs up every time I see you, which would be all the time.

onePieceCharacters.name: Sanji
onePieceCharacters.description: Chivalrous cook of the Straw Hat Pirates
onePieceCharacters.pickup: Like Sanji, I'd fight anyone who disrespects you and cook you the best meals.

songs.name: No One Noticed by Marias
songs.pickup: Like your favorite song, I notice every little thing about you.

location.description: The beautiful city where she resides
